event.name: AEA_GODS_CULTIST_WRECK
event.text: You arrive at the beacon to discover a large wreck, at first you don't recognise who it belongs to but a moment later you're able to make out the Cultist design. You're not sure how a cultist vessel got here, but you collect what scrap there is.

event.name: AEA_GODS_CULTIST_STATION
event.text: A large station occupies this "beacon." You recognise the cultist design but don't recieve any responces to any of your hails. Upon closer inspection you discover the station is entirely empty, towards the center of the station there's a large symbol drawn on the ground surrounded by runes but whoever drew this is long gone by now.

event.name: AEA_GODS_MEDUSA_UNLOCK
event.text: A partially wrecked statue ship sits at the beacon here, floating nearby. Scans indicate that it's reactor detonated, rendering the ship defenseless.
You board the ship and find it empty of life, there's a large hole where the reactor should be, but the rest of the ship appears unharmed.

You've come to a strange room on the enemy ship, the walls appear to be covered in live moving snakes, theres a console attached to one wall which you're able to power on with an external power source. The system is very foreign and alien, but you're able to download what appears to be the blueprints for the room you're in.

You've cleared the ship and are on the way back to your own when one of your crew yells in surprise as they see the massive stone figure appear infront of them. You don't have time to fight and order a quick retreat back to your own ship. Unfortunately you find a pair of the statues waiting onboard.
The void remains impressively dark, you have time to do something on your ship.

event.name: AEA_GODS_RUINS
event.text: You've arrived at a vast network of ruins, towards the center lies a massive chamber and in the middle a large raised plinth. A massive stone statue sits at the center of the plinth, as you approach it speaks directly into your head. "WHAT DO YOU BRING?" A series of images flash into your head. First is the blood of one of your crew, spilt across the plinth in front of the statue, you notice that although weakened your crewmember is still alive. The next shows a weapon smashed down onto the plinth. The third and final is a pile of scrap, slowly disintegrating into the plinth.
